title: Netflix Under Fire After Cancelling Five Shows Including Its “Best Series”
description:
Netflix has become widely recognized for its frequent cancellations. Now it’s been revealed that the massive streaming platform is cancelling as many as five of its shows. This announcement comes not long after the conclusion of the SAG-AFTRA strike, and reveals that Netflix’s alleged “best series” is one of the Netflix shows getting the axe. [...]

The post Netflix Under Fire After Cancelling Five Shows Including Its “Best Series” appeared first on ScreenGeek.

title: Rockstar Releases First Trailer For ‘Grand Theft Auto 6’
description:
The Grand Theft Auto video game franchise has been one of the most popular video game brands for as long as 25 years. Now, a decade following the release of Grand Theft Auto V, Rockstar Games has officially released the trailer for Grand Theft Auto 6. Rockstar Games initially had the trailer scheduled to be [...]

The post Rockstar Releases First Trailer For ‘Grand Theft Auto 6’ appeared first on ScreenGeek.
